H0.text: Who was the first person after Scott to reach the South Pole overland. Robert Falcon Scott

H1.text: Who was the first person after Scott to reach the South Pole overland. Ernest Shackleton

H2.text: Who was the first person after Scott to reach the South Pole overland. Douglas Mawson

H3.text: Who was the first person after Scott to reach the South Pole overland. Sir Ed

A4.text: His party was the first to reach the Pole overland since Amundsen in 1911 and Scott in 1912
